22.m: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us in Christ with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places - Ephesians 1:3 (ESV)

l.q: In the Bible reading, who wrote the letter and to whom was it written?
l.a: Paul wrote the letter to the saints in Ephesus.

l.q: What has God blessed the saints in Christ?
l.a: God has blessed the saints in Christ with every spiritual blessings in heavenly places.

l.q: What spiritual blessings are mentioned in the Bible reading?
l.a: God chose us, his saints, to be holy and blameless before Him. He adopted us. He redeemed us, He forgave us our sins, and He has plans to unite us to Him. In Christ we have been sealed with the Holy Spirit.

l.q: Who is the head of the church?
l.a: Jesus Christ is the head of the church.

s.h:
Pleased as man with men to dwell 
 Jesus, our Emmanuel

22.a: Enjoy a cup of warm chocolate or apple cider with someone who lives with you.
